Texto: 
non-contributory
supportive
enhancement of the cisternal portion of right trigeminal nerve with edema in the adjacent pons and middle cerebellar peduncle.
radiation necrosis
• multiple sclerosis
• metastatic disease
• infarction
• lyme disease
• sarcoidosis
• schwannoma
57 year old man had right-sided trigeminal neuralgia, treated by gamma knife therapy one year ago.  his ymptoms resolved - then returned 10 months following treatment.
the process progressed between the august and november scans with increasing pathological enhancement and edema.
